abilities.name: ORB PROJECTION
abilities.description: Launch a force field that can pierce heroes, flying to maximum distance before returning to Invisible Woman; damaging enemies and healing teammates.
abilities.details: Orbs can pierce heroes and return to Invisible Woman after reaching their maximum distance. They damage enemies and heal teammates

abilities.name: GUARDIAN SHIELD
abilities.description: Generate a force field in front of a selected ally. The shield can block damage and provide Healing Over Time to nearby allies. Enemies that pass through the shield are slowed.

abilities.name: PSIONIC VORTEX
abilities.description: Gather psionic energy and cast it, upon hitting a target, scene or pressing the LShift key again, it erupts into a psionic vortex, continuously drawing in enemies and causing damage.
abilities.casting: Single-cast projectile with delayed impact that also generates a spell field
abilities.details: Applies a slow effect to enemies within the spell field; the closer they are to the center of the field, the greater the slow effect

abilities.name: FORCE PHYSICS
abilities.description: Manipulate psionic energy to push or pull enemies in front of you.
abilities.details: On cast, press to push enemies away, or to pull enemies in.

abilities.name: AGILE STRIKE
abilities.description: Release a three-hit combo, the third attack will launch up enemies in front.

abilities.name: VEILED STEP
abilities.description: Generate a force field at your feet, stepping on it propels you into Invisible state.

abilities.name: COVERT ADVANCE
abilities.description: Enter Invisible state some time after disengaging from combat and grant yourself healing over time.

ultimate.name: INVISIBLE BOUNDARY
ultimate.description: Manifest an unseen forcefield within a chosen area, rendering allies inside undetectable by enemies and providing healing over time. Enemies that pass through the field are slowed.
ultimate.casting: Targeted, generates a cylindrical spell field

passives.name: FANTASTI-FORCE
passives.description: The Invisible Woman taps into her powers, channeling Psionic Might to fortify the entire Fantastic Four team. This formidable force bolsters Mister Fantastic, The Thing, and Human Torch, granting damage resistance. Once activated, they can continually generate bonus health, making up for lost health with each passing moment.

gameplay.strategy_overview: Focus on a backline support role, maximizing both damage and healing. Position yourself strategically to take advantage of bottlenecks, healing allies and damaging enemies simultaneously. Prioritize lining up multiple targets with your primary fire to charge your ultimate quickly and maximize healing and damage. Use your abilities effectively: the Guardian Shield for blocking damage, slowing enemies, and healing; Psionic Vortex for crowd control and confirming picks; and Force Physics for displacing enemies. Remember to use your double jump and invisibility strategically for survival. Use your ultimate to counter enemy ultimates and strategically combine it with other abilities, especially in stacked team compositions. Position shields out of the enemy's line of sight for continuous healing. -- As Sue Storm, your strength lies in controlling the flow of battle and providing crucial support. Employ your force push/pull to disrupt enemy positioning, secure eliminations, and peel for teammates. Don't forget the utility of Psionic Vortex to counter aerial threats and clear enemy deployables. While your primary fire has limited range, position yourself to effectively use your healing shield on allies in the thick of the fight and remember your ultimate is a rapid heal, not invincibility, so use it strategically.
weaknesses: Limited self-sustain, as outside of her Ultimate, she can only heal herself while invisible or through Guardian Shield.
In addition, any damage taken will break the invisibility.
Very reliant on positioning to maximize damage and healing, as her primary fire has relatively low range.
In addition, her primary fire cannot deal critical hits.
Guardian Shield cannot be cast on herself, and will only regenerate if Invisible Woman reclaims it from the field.
Allies inside the Invisible Boundary can still be damaged by the enemy team.

achievements.name: Daughters of Liberty
achievements.description: As Invisible Woman, partner with Black Widow to land 1 KO.

achievements.name: Lady of the House
achievements.description: As Invisible Woman, assist the Fantastic Four members 10 times.

lore_details.ingame_bio_quote: "I'm not the type who fades quietly into the background."
lore_details.ingame_bio_text: The Invisible Woman is able to slip in and out of sight without a trace. No matter how intense the battle may be, Susan Richards always keeps her cool, conjuring up impenetrable force fields to protect herself and her team.

hero_stories.title: Built To Last
hero_stories.content:
"Cosmic rays didn't make me who I am today. My family did." 
Susan Richards took a deep breath as she stood by the window of the Baxter Building and gazed out at a city bathed in darkness. According to the atomic clock that her husband Reed had installed on the kitchen wall, sunrise should have been over two hours ago. By now, the skyscrapers lining 42nd Street should have been glistening in the morning's rays, but Sue honestly couldn't remember the last time she had seen any natural light, save for the haunting glow of the Blood Moon that hung ever-present in the sky above Manhattan.
"A warm beverage for you," a synthesized voice said from behind her.
Sue turned to see H.E.R.B.I.E., the Fantastic Four's robotic assistant, extending his mechanical arm and offering her a steaming cup of herbal tea.
"Thanks, H.E.R.B.I.E.," Sue said, taking the glass from him and inhaling the gentle aroma wafting from it. "You're a doll."
"Actually, I am a Humanoid Experimental Robot, B-Type, Integrated Electronics," H.E.R.B.I.E. replied. "Dolls are not capable of independent thought."
"Of course not," Sue said with a smile. "Just a figure of speech."
"You look concerned, Mrs. Richards," H.E.R.B.I.E. said, hovering beside Sue as they both looked out the window at the city below. "Have things in the city taken a turn for the worse?"

balance_changes.date_version: 25/01/10: Version 20250110 / Season 1: Eternal Night Falls Launch
changes: Invisible Woman was released as the 35th character to be introduced to Marvel Rivals as a Strategist hero.
Added 2 new costumes: First Family and Malice.
Added to the Fantastic Four Team-Up Ability with Mister Fantastic.
Mobility abilities for specific heroes are now fully operational within the range of Invisible Woman's Psionic Vortex - no more containment issues!
Fixed an issue preventing Namor and Invisible Woman from unleashing their ultimate abilities at certain door locations--now they can break through any barrier!
Added 1 new costume: The Life Fantastic.
Increase the energy cost of Invisible Boundary from 4000 to 4300.
Added 1 new costume: Blood Shield (unlocked from ranked mode in either Season 1 or Season 1.5)
Decrease the shield value of Guardian Shield from 300 to 250.
Fixed an error in the recovery rate of Invisible Woman's Guardian Shield.

lore_details.official_quote: "Even when you can't see me, I'll still make you believe."
lore_details.official_description: The Invisible Woman is a Strategist hero in Marvel Rivals, and is the 35th hero introduced to the game's roster during Season 1: Eternal Night Falls. She has a team-up ability that works in conjunction with Mister Fantastic, Human Torch and The Thing.
